channel.title: RSC Spawn PK (Rune Legacy)
channel.description:
[img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/3299/headerxhp.png[/img]
Play at: [url=http://www.rlwebclient.com/2001/]RlWebclient.com[/url] Download: [url=http://www.rlwebclient.com/2001/rsc.jar]http://www.rlwebclient.com/2001/rsc.jar[/url]
This is a Spawn-Pk RuneScape Classic server. Just something people can have fun with, since I doubt a lot of guys want to PK on RSCEmulation (as you have to do all the training then wait for their pvp system to be enabled, as I heard it switches off and on). Anyway, I'll update this thread a little more later. We need more RSClassic servers.
Commands:
[code]::setlevel ::item[/code]
ItemID List: [url=http://jamili.da3rx.com/rsc/items.html]http://jamili.da3rx.com/rsc/items.html[/url]
[img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/1959/20130305104926.png[/img]
[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/508/20130305113630.png[/img]

item.title: RSC Spawn PK (Rune Legacy)
item.dc:creator: @def_pker def pker
item.description:
@def_pker wrote:

its not rs2 but still bro fast lvling is diffent then setstats so change that up and take out the ::item command and also add say might have a usefull server if your going to host it then might as well try and make it usefull no1 wants this kinda server i tried playing it and got bored in 2 minutes after killing everyone haha well gl and keep trying

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Spawn PK (Rune Legacy)
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

The population is dead. You will probably notice when you have a 1-5 player base.

GL and have fun anyways.

Read full topic
